description:
misc/dashboard: cope with removed Package fields.

adg removed some now-unwanted fields in Package a while ago,
but there are still datastore entities with those fields,
so we must explicitly check for ErrFieldMismatch and ignore it.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: adg),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=014461a28295 ***

misc/dashboard: cope with removed Package fields.

adg removed some now-unwanted fields in Package a while ago,
but there are still datastore entities with those fields,
so we must explicitly check for ErrFieldMismatch and ignore it.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=adg, golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6007043

subject: code review 6007043: misc/dashboard: cope with removed Package fields.
